parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds an item with the given text to the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user [[dialog]].
<br>
It returns the index of the newly added item.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lbAdd]] [idc, text]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, text]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - row index

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[lbAdd]] text

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] - row index </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_index = [[lbAdd]] [101, "First item"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_index = _control [[lbAdd]] "First item";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>

</comment></dl>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 12, 2015 - 11:01 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command can be very very frustrating to use because it does not output any errors if unable to function.<br>
Often, the 2nd provided syntax needs to be used like this:<br>
<code>_giveYourControlAname = (findDisplay 7) displayCtrl 9;
_addThisToListBox = "Option";
_giveYourControlAname lbAdd _addThisToListBox;</code>
Where "7" is the "idd" of the dialog you made in your ".hpp" file and where "9" is the "idc" of the RscListBox or RscComboBox.<br>
The code above will add an option named "Option" to the ListBox or ComboBox.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
